entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:34 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 3:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear

Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 64 %

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
